articles.author: Perri Ormont Blumberg
articles.title: These are the most popular burger condiments used by Americans, according to DoorDash grocery data - Fox Business
articles.description: DoorDash reveals the most popular burger condiments according to its grocery data — ketchup and mayonnaise are running a tight race, with mustard trailing behind.
articles.content: Grilling season is on the horizon, and to celebrate the most burger-ful time of the year, food delivery and takeout platform DoorDash did a deep dive into grocery shopping trends related to burgers. … [+2583 chars]
